filecoordinationd(8) System Manager's Manual filecoordinationd(8)

NAME

filecoordinationd — system-wide file access coordination

SYNOPSIS

filecoordinationd

DESCRIPTION

filecoordinationd is used by the Foundation framework's NSFileCoordinator class to coordinate access to files by multiple processes, and to message registered NSFilePresenters.

There are no configuration options to filecoordinationd. Users should not run filecoordinationd manually.

March 15, 2011 Mac OS X
